name: Top Moto Speed: Traffic Rider
description:
Top Moto Speed: Traffic Rider is an exciting and full action packed motto racing game in which you have an opportunity to boost your racing skills and drive your motorcycle as fast as you can because the competition is very tough and you have to do some extra to win the competition in this racing game for free.
# Stunning 3D graphics.
# Smooth and realistic bake handling.
# Fast high-performance motorcycles and amazing environment.
# Basic customization through paint and wheels.
# Highway traffic rider - 3D bike racing smooth and simple control.
